entry.tran: 未婚的；没有女朋友（或男朋友）的
entry.def: Someone who is unattached is not married or does not have a girlfriend or boyfriend.

example.ex: I knew only two or three unattached men.
example.tran: 我只认识两三个未婚的男士。

means.word_mean: 2. not associated in an exclusive sexual relationship
3. (of animals) able to swim about; not attached
